data.name: Venthyr
data.description:
The Chaos - Venthyr [A]
Units:
+10% life steal (affects organic units only)
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+0.5 HP/sec regeneration

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armors
-10% research speed

Magic:
False Life (Resurrects 1 friendly unit for 20s) (doesn't affect Venthyr Warrior and Acolyte)
Fire Rain (Deals 100 damage in AoE)
Anima Infusion (dispels upgrades penalty from 1 Venthyr Warrior) (transforms Acolyte into Blood Knight)

Traits: Venhtyr from Revendreth are one of the four covenants in Shadowlands. They feast upon the souls of prideful and vain in their gothic kingdom of wealth and suffering. The race is hard to understand at first, while being rather weak at the start of the game. With the help of researches, slaves and cheap defensive abilities perform efficiently at withstanding enemy's offensives. Become more powerful in the late game once they have access to more slaves, souls and blood to satiate their thirst. Main bulk of units is small in numbers but great in strength.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+1 HP/s building regeneration
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Corruption Aura
auras.description:
-6 unit armor
(does not affect Special unit)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Inspiration Aura
auras.description:
+40% extra dmg for Heroes
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Vethyr Statue [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Slaves for Eternity

Gives Crimson Mirror ability (Blocks targeted spell every 15 sec) to Slaver, Soul Master and Blood Knight and increases their hit points by 50

+55 HP

bonuses.name: Source Of Magic [X]
bonuses.description:
Icreases Soul Master and Venthyr Town mana by 10%. Unlocks more upgrades inside this building.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.name: Storage Stone
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Venthyr Town mana reg

upgrades.name: Empowerment
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+12 Soul Master damage
-10% Soul Master spell cooldown
False Life +5s duration
Fire Rain +25 damage
Anima Infusion +5 HP/sec, +3 target

upgrades.name: Blood Fields
upgrades.description: Gives: 5 damage per second in 1200 AoE around main building

bonuses.name: Orb of Blood [D]
bonuses.description:
Increases Venthyr Warrior, Slaver, Soul Master and Blood Knight attack rate by 7% and after kill increases max amount of HP on 20/40/60
(affects organic units only)
(upgrades together with Venthyr Town)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Glory for Anime [C]
bonuses.description:
Venthyr are an aristocratic race, in charge of souls burdened with anger and pride. While they are sending them to the harsh route of salvation, they also gather precious Anima. And said Anima can be used for our own gain...

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Glory for Anime
spells.description:
Anima Gathering Conditions:
+1 MP for any enemy non-Hero unit killed
+100 MP for enemy Hero unit killed
+20 MP whenever an enemy Hero dies, even if not killed by Venthyr
+50 MP if ally Hero unit dies during Blood Throne
-100 MP for summoning any Hero unit

When you summon a Hero, if the Glory for Anime has 100 or more mana, the Hero gains +1 Random Stats
If it doesn't, the Hero gains a -30% damage, -10 armor debuff for 120 sec

spells.name: Anima Infused Weapons [Q]
spells.description:
+1 attack upgrade for all non-Hero Units
(300 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Anima Infused Armor [W]
spells.description:
+1 defence upgrade for all non-Hero units
(300 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Blood Cage [E]
spells.description:
Stuns enemy Hero unit for 13 sec
(210 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Enrage [A]
spells.description:
Give ally Hero +20 AS for 20 sec
(240 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Land of Terror [W]
spells.description:
-10 armor aura, covers whole map in 60 sec
(270 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Dead Rising [W]
spells.description:
Raise all dead units on whole map
(300 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Small Reward [Q]
spells.description:
Give your Hero a random tier 1 item
(Doesn't work if you have Hero replacement bonus)
(150 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Relic Item [W]
spells.description:
Give your Hero a random tier 4 item until death
(Gives tier 1 item instead if you are playing with Item Merchant bonus)
(Refreshes abilities instead if you are playing with Hero/SU replacement)
(180 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Grand Heal [W]
spells.description:
Restore 30% of max HP on Hero
(10% max hp on Special Unit)
(210 sec cooldown)

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

towerUpgrades.name: Blood Throne
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: army boost for 60s
Affects: All non-Hero units
(army lifesteal is doubled during this)
(heroes can use 5th ability during this)

Lv1: +5 HP/sec after killing 500 enemies
Lv2: +10 HP/sec after killing 400 enemies
Lv3: +15 HP/sec after killing 300 enemies
Lv4: +20 HP/sec after killing 200 enemies

towerUpgrades.name: Infused Stones
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: splash attacks
Affects: Bloodapult, Venthyr Tower
(30% to deal bonus damage in 200 AoE)

Lv1: 30 dmg
Lv2: 60 dmg
Lv3: 90 dmg
Lv4: 120 dmg

towerUpgrades.name: Crimson Madness
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra dmg after hit
Affects: Slaver, Soul Master, Blood Knight

Lv1: +30% extra dmg, lose 4 HP/sec for 10 sec
Lv2: +60% extra dmg, lose 6 HP/sec for 10 sec
Lv3: +90% extra dmg, lose 8 HP/sec for 10 sec
Lv4: +120% extra dmg, lose 10 HP/sec for 10 sec

spells.name: Inner Fire 0
spells.description: Increases unit damage by 0% and armor by 0

towerUpgrades.name: Deafening Shriek
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage reduction
Affects: Screamer Bat
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: reduce dmg by 15% in 750 AoE
Lv2: reduce dmg by 25% in 750 AoE
Lv3: reduce dmg by 35% in 750 AoE
Lv4: reduce dmg by 45% in 750 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Loyal Servant
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(Anima Infusion triggers unused Dagger/Mission)

Lv1: has Donation (gives gold)
(receive 20/30/40/50 gold)
Lv2: has Anima Recovery (heals allies)
(heals 3/6/9 target for 100 HP on death)
Lv3: has Ritual Dagger (bonus damage, slow)
(100/150 dmg, 15% slow for 60s)
Lv4: has Explosive Mission (stuns enemies)
(3 second stun in 450 AoE)

spells.name: Red Splinters [Z]
spells.description:
Deals 200 damage in 170 AoF.
Stuns for 16 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

spells.name: Shadow Strike
spells.description: Deal30damage

spells.name: Mindblast
spells.description: Stuns units for 4 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Royal Cohort
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Blood Knight and Slaver

Lv1: 10% to deal 2x dmg
Lv2: 20% to deal 2.5x dmg
Lv3: 30% to deal 3x dmg
Lv4: 40% to deal 3.5x dmg

towerUpgrades.name: Slaves for Eternity
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: decreases/increases HP and armor
Affects: Venthyr Warrior, Acolyte, Slaver, Soul Master and Blood Knight

Lv1: lose/gain 100/200 HP, 2/4 armor
Lv2: lose/gain 150/300 HP, 4/8 armor
Lv3: lose/gain 200/400 HP, 6/12 armor
Lv4: lose/gain 250/500 HP, 8/16 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Dark Terror
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage, stun and heal on attack
Affects: Blood Knight
(has half duration on Heroes)
(does not affect Special Unit)

Lv1: 9% for 20 dmg, 1 sec stun, restore 40 HP
Lv2: 18% for 20 dmg, 1 sec stun, restore 80 HP
Lv3: 27% for 20 dmg, 1 sec stun, restore 120 HP
Lv4: 36% for 20 dmg, 1 sec stun, restore 160 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Unchained Soul
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: empowers Anima Infusion
Affects: Soul Master

Lv1: 40 damage in 500 AoE
Lv2: 80 damage in 500 AoE
Lv3: 120 damage in 500 AoE
Lv4: 160 damage in 500 AoE

skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Infused Stones (Lv1)
skills.description: 25% to deal 30 damage in 150 AoE

heroes.name: The Darkwing General
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Vampire Skin (Passive Skill)
16-40% to block an attack

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 120-240 area damage

Blood Shield (Self Spell)
2-14 bonus armor
(15 second cooldown)

Howling Ghosts (Damage Spell)
8 ghosts for 15-30 seconds
(60 second cooldown)

Stoneborn Fury (Damage Spell)
250 damage in a line

skills.name: Earth's Shield - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Increases armor by 10.
Lasts 45 seconds.

skills.name: Howling Ghosts - [Level 3]
skills.description:
Creates a swarm of angry spirits that drain the life energies of nearby enemy units. They store the life energy they drain from their victims and use it to replenish Rokhan's hit points when they return.
Lasts seconds.

heroes.name: The Fallen Prince
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
War Stomp (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Anima Siphon (Orb Effect)
22-44% lifesteal

Overpower (Self Spell)
10-70% attack rate bonus
(60 second cooldown)

Blood Lightning (Orb Effect)
15-27% for 200-350 damage, 4-10 units

Vorpalia Blade (Disable Spell)
deals 1500 damage, -20% speed for 30 seconds

skills.name: War Stomp - [Level 5]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AOws,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and stunning them for <AOws,Dur4> seconds.

skills.name: Shadow Orb - [Level 4]
skills.description: Gain 24% of attack damage as hit points.

skills.name: Berserk - [Level 1]
skills.description: Causes this unit to attack 10% faster.

heroes.name: The Accuser
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Blood Shockwave (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)
(30 second cooldown)

Fire Shower (Damage Spell)
300-600 damage in 600 AoE
(60 second cooldown)

Paralysis Aura (Disable Aura)
22-40% move speed reduction
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Wither and Rot (Damage Spell)
30-60 HP/sec, 10-40 MP/sec for 10 sec in 500 AoE
(80 second cooldown)

Pride Aura (Support Aura)
+5 armor in 750 AoE

skills.name: Carrion Swarm - [Level 4]
skills.description: Sends a horde of bats to deal <AUcs,DataA4> damage to each enemy unit in a cone.

skills.name: Blizzard - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls down 1 freezing ice shard wave; each wave deals <AHbz,DataB4> damage to units in an area.

skills.name: Paralysis Aura - [Level 1]
skills.description: Reduces nearby enemy units' movement speed by 22%.

skills.name: Bondage Blue - [Level 1]
skills.description: Bombards an area with firebals, dealing up to 175 damage to enemy land units.

heroes.name: The First Blooded
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Anima Explosion (Orb Effect)
110-180 damage on unit kill
(300 area of effect)
(500 damage on Hero kill in 500 AoE)

Blood Strike (Passive Skill)
18-24% to deal 2x damage

Soul Drain (Damage Spell)
steals 8-14% max HP of target
(steals double the amount from Heroes)
(affects enemy Heroes/Special Unit only)
(60 second cooldown)

Remornia (Unique Spell)
has own unique abilities
(restores 1 MP per hit on Hero and per kill)
(+1 MP/sec during Blood Throne)
